name: Rana's Eclipse
description:
Play as Rana the elite soldier who is sent to scout a poisonous planet and find a cure for the victims of an alien attack. Use your gun to aim and shoot in all directions, jump over obstacles and find powerups to survive.

Rana's Eclipse is a scifi action game made in summer 2018 by the Self-Offensive Games team as a part of a game development course. This short Android game was showcased in Finland GameXpo 2018 and ranked as one of the three best games from the course.

Note: this is the original version presented at GameXpo 2018 and has game breaking bug that allows clipping through specific spots in the level and minor bugs with game logic. Game can be played through and completed and thankfully game breaking bug is rare.
